name: Survey analysis overview
description: Explore how digital technologies are being adopted across Europeâ€™s agriculture and forestry sectors.

baseWidgets.title: Adoption of technology by country
baseWidgets.question: Has your organisation integrated digital technologies into its workflows?

baseWidgets.title: Sector
baseWidgets.question: Sector (agri/forestry/both)

name: General information
description: Captures basic organisational details (e.g. sector, size, location, stakeholder type)

baseWidgets.title: Type of stakeholder
baseWidgets.question: Type of stakeholder

baseWidgets.title: Location
baseWidgets.question: Location (country/region)

baseWidgets.title: Primary Area of Operation in agriculture
baseWidgets.question: Primary area of operation in agriculture

baseWidgets.title: Primary Area of Operation in forestry
baseWidgets.question: Primary area of operation in forestry

baseWidgets.title: Organic farming operation
baseWidgets.question: Organic farming operation

name: Governance model
description: Measures the impact of governance models and regulatory considerations on the digital technologies adoption

baseWidgets.title: Governance model impact
baseWidgets.question: Have specific governance models either facilitated or hindered the adoption of digital technologies in your organization?

baseWidgets.title: Regulatory considerations
baseWidgets.question: Are there regulatory considerations influencing the governance of digital technology adoption?

name: Adoption of digital technologies and technology integration
description: Assesses which technologies have been implemented and how they are embedded in daily operations.

baseWidgets.title: Integration of digital technologies
baseWidgets.question: Has your organisation integrated digital technologies into its workflows?

baseWidgets.title: Type of digital technology used for agriculture
baseWidgets.question: What type of digital technology has been used for agriculture?

baseWidgets.title: Type of digital technology used for forestry
baseWidgets.question: What type of digital technology has been used for forestry?

baseWidgets.title: Goals or challenges prompting adoption
baseWidgets.question: Were there specific goals or challenges that prompted the adoption of digital tools?

baseWidgets.title: Level of digitalization in farming/forestry practices
baseWidgets.question: How would you rate the level of digitalization in your farming/forestry practices on a scale of 1 to 5 (1 being low, 5 being high)

baseWidgets.title: Primary functions of technologies in the value chain
baseWidgets.question: What are the primary functions of these technologies in the agriculture or forestry value chain?

baseWidgets.title: Adoption level of these technologies
baseWidgets.question: What is the adoption level of these technologies?

baseWidgets.title: Challenges in the adoption of digital technologies
baseWidgets.question: Have you encountered challenges in the adoption of digital technologies?

baseWidgets.title: Barriers hindering further integration
baseWidgets.question: Are there specific barriers hindering further integration?

name: Technology performance
description: Evaluates usability, functionality, and interoperability of the adopted tools

baseWidgets.title: Perceived limitations or challenges
baseWidgets.question: Have you encountered any perceived limitations or challenges in utilising these technologies?

baseWidgets.title: Network connectivity
baseWidgets.question: Do you have network connectivity?

name: Data management and data sharing practices
description: Investigates internal and external data handling procedures, governance models, and data access policies

baseWidgets.title: Data collection from farming/forestry activities
baseWidgets.question: Is data collected from your farming/forestry activities?

baseWidgets.title: Type of data collected
baseWidgets.question: What type of data do you collect?

baseWidgets.title: Payment for data
baseWidgets.question: Do you pay for this data?

baseWidgets.title: Data sharing practices
baseWidgets.question: Do you share this data?

baseWidgets.title: Challenges in data sharing and interoperability
baseWidgets.question: Do challenges exist in sharing and interoperability of agricultural and forestry data?

baseWidgets.title: Contribution of data management and sharing practices
baseWidgets.question: How do these practices contribute to or impede the overall effectiveness of technology adoption?

name: Social benefits and impact
description: Evaluates social benefits and impact of adopting digital technologies

baseWidgets.title: Social benefits
baseWidgets.question: Have you experienced social benefits through the use of digital technologies?

baseWidgets.title: Overall social impact
baseWidgets.question: What is the overall social impact of adopting digital technologies?

name: Economic benefits and impact
description: Measures financial performance outcomes such as cost-efficiency, productivity gains, or market access

baseWidgets.title: Cost savings or increased efficiency
baseWidgets.question: Have digital technologies resulted in cost savings or increased efficiency?

baseWidgets.title: Savings in inputs due to digital technologies
baseWidgets.question: Have you seen savings in inputs due to digital technologies?

baseWidgets.title: Overall economic impact
baseWidgets.question: What is the overall economic impact of implementing digital technologies

name: Environmental and sustainability impact
description: Explores how digital technologies contribute to resource efficiency, emissions reduction, and sustainability targets

baseWidgets.title: Environmental benefits
baseWidgets.question: Have you observed any positive or negative effects on biodiversity in agricultural and forestry areas due to digital technology adoption?

name: Future outlook
description: Gathers perspectives on planned upgrades, technology trajectories, and potential barriers

baseWidgets.title: Plans to expand or upgrade digital infrastructure
baseWidgets.question: Are there plans to expand or upgrade your current digital infrastructure?
